Name: Houpeng
Alliance: Zhangjiang bashê (Zhangjiang eight shê ritual alliance)
Village_Settlement: Houpeng is part of the Gangli Administrative Village 港利行政村. The population of Houpeng village is approximately 600 people.
Surname_Groups: The main surnames in the village are the Li 李 and the Peng 彭.
Village_Temples: 1) Xinglongci 兴隆祠 is dedicated to Fude zhengshen 福德正神. Secondary gods are Sanyi jiaozhu 三一教主, Xuantian shangdi 玄天上帝, and Puhua tianzun 普化天尊.

Rituals.Yuanxiao processions: On 1/9 Fazhu xianfei 法主仙妃 is invited from Zhaolingong 昭灵宫 for a procession throughout the village.
Rituals.Birthday celebrations of the gods: 4/10: The celebration of the Zunzhu mingwang 尊主明王 and Houtu furen 后土夫人 of the Qiandong shushê 前东书社 is held with opera performances. 6/6: The celebration of Fude zhengshen 福德正神 is held with opera performances.
